content:
[
  {"path":"pyproject.toml","description":"Project configuration defining package metadata, dependencies, and the psyprim console-script entry point.","category":"config"},
  {"path":"README.md","description":"Documentation describing the mission-aligned workflow plan, community engagement steps, metadata checklists, evaluation methods, and CLI usage examples.","category":"documentation"},
  {"path":"src/psyprim/__init__.py","description":"Package initializer exporting the library version and top-level public interfaces.","category":"source"},
  {"path":"src/psyprim/cli.py","description":"Complete Typer-based CLI implementing workflow commands for initializing projects, generating checklists, validating metadata, and producing citation/provenance reports.","category":"source"},
  {"path":"src/psyprim/models.py","description":"Pydantic models for standardized primary-source records including edition/translation provenance, variant pagination, and public-domain citation fields.","category":"source"},
  {"path":"src/psyprim/checklists.py","description":"Implements metadata checklist templates, required/optional fields, and risk-weighted validation rules for scholarship workflows.","category":"source"},
  {"path":"src/psyprim/provenance.py","description":"Utilities to represent and validate edition/translation provenance chains, source repositories, and transformation steps.","category":"source"},
  {"path":"src/psyprim/pagination.py","description":"Logic for handling and validating variant pagination mappings (print page to digital locator) and emitting canonical citation locators.","category":"source"},
  {"path":"src/psyprim/citations.py","description":"Generates standardized public-domain-friendly citations (including archive identifiers and access dates) and machine-readable citation exports.","category":"source"},
  {"path":"src/psyprim/evaluation.py","description":"Implements survey and audit-study scaffolding (instrument templates, sampling plans, audit rubrics) and produces analysis-ready JSON/CSV outputs.","category":"source"},
  {"path":"tests/test_cli_end_to_end.py","description":"End-to-end tests exercising key CLI workflows: init, checklist generation, metadata validation, and report/citation outputs.","category":"test"},
  {"path":"tests/test_models_and_validation.py","description":"Unit tests covering models and validators for provenance, pagination variants, and public-domain citation requirements.","category":"test"}
]
